keyMoments.title: Minozebra's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Minozebra debuts as one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down, shown knocking prisoners into the boiling blood pool of Level 4. He meets with Sadi and the other Jailer Beasts to discuss Luffy's infiltration.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another awakened Zoan user in Impel Down's defense force, expanding the prison's powerful guardians.

physicalDescription: Permanently stuck in his awakened Zoan form, Minozebra resembles a large bipedal zebra with human characteristics. He has distinctive black and white stripes, bored-looking eyes, a runny nose and large lips typical of Jailer Beasts, plus long elegant hair. He wears pants on his human abdomen.
personality: Described as very shy despite his brutal nature as a torturer. He regularly tortures the prisoners of Impel Down without mercy.

abilities.name: Awakened Zoan Transformation
abilities.description: Minozebra has eaten an unnamed Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows him to transform into a zebra. As an awakened Zoan user, he has rapid recovery from injuries but has lost his human consciousness completely.

abilities.name: Mace Combat
abilities.description: Fights using a mace with spikes around the iron ball (altered to small bumps in the anime adaptation).

relationships.description: Minozebra serves under Chief Guard Sadi's command

keyMoments.title: Zotto Reports Emperor Clash
keyMoments.description: Marine Lieutenant Zotto nervously reports to Vice Admiral Momonga that Shanks and Kaidou have clashed in the New World, with Shanks preventing Kaidou from interfering with Whitebeard's war preparations.
keyMoments.significance: Delivers critical intelligence about a major world event that affects the balance of power among the Emperors and has implications for the upcoming Marineford War.

physicalDescription: An average-sized man wearing black glasses and a Marine cap with ear flaps. Under the flaps, he wears headphones. He has facial hair going across the bottom of his face, wears a red tie, dark green suit, and light green shirt under a standard Marine officer coat. He carries a rifle on his back.
personality: Appears anxious and easily flustered, often seen sweating when delivering important reports. His nervous demeanor reflects the weight of the intelligence he carries.

relationships.description: Zotto serves as a lieutenant under Vice Admiral Momonga's command in the G-1 Branch

keyMoments.title: Falls into Level 4
keyMoments.description: After defeating Minotaurus, Luffy and his allies fall through the collapsed floor into Level 4, the Blazing Hell, narrowly avoiding the pool of boiling blood.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy progresses deeper into Impel Down, getting closer to Ace but facing increasingly dangerous obstacles.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Searches for Food
keyMoments.description: Exhausted and starving, Luffy picks up the scent of food and runs off desperately to find nourishment, leading the group straight into a pack of guards.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's physical exhaustion and weakening state from the constant battles and lack of food in Impel Down.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Warden Magellan
keyMoments.description: After defeating guards on Level 4, Luffy comes face to face with Warden Magellan, who drops down to personally stop the intruders' rampage through the prison.
keyMoments.significance: This confrontation marks the beginning of one of Luffy's most dangerous battles, as Magellan's poison powers make him nearly unbeatable.

keyMoments.title: Magellan Coordinates Defense
keyMoments.description: Magellan strategically organizes Impel Down's forces, splitting troops to guard stairs to different levels and preparing to personally confront Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's tactical intelligence and his determination to stop the infiltration personally.

keyMoments.title: Magellan Confronts Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Warden drops down from above to personally block Luffy's path, declaring he's had enough of the rampage and preparing to use his deadly poison powers.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the major battle between Luffy and one of his most dangerous opponents, whose poison abilities make him nearly untouchable.

keyMoments.title: Daz Bonez Attacks Escaping Prisoner
keyMoments.description: While imprisoned in Level 4 and forced to perform hard labor, Daz Bonez is accidentally hit by an escaping prisoner. Enraged, he swings his lumber and knocks the prisoner into the pool of boiling blood.
keyMoments.significance: Reintroduces Daz Bonez after his defeat in Alabasta, showing he's imprisoned in Impel Down and still ruthlessly dangerous. Sets up his later role in the escape.

reveals.content: Daz Bonez is revealed to be imprisoned in Level 4 of Impel Down, the Blazing Hell, after his defeat by Roronoa Zoro during the Alabasta Arc.

keyMoments.title: Receives Report of Emperor Clash
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Momonga receives a report from Lieutenant Zotto about the clash between Shanks and Kaidou in the New World, learning that Shanks prevented Kaidou from interfering with Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Momonga learns of a major world event that affects the strategic situation leading up to the Marineford War.

keyMoments.title: Hancock's Growing Anxiety
keyMoments.description: As she travels through Impel Down with the Marines, Hancock grows increasingly anxious about Luffy's safety and struggles to hide her feelings from Momonga and the other officers.
keyMoments.significance: Continues to develop Hancock's romantic feelings for Luffy and her internal conflict between duty and her desire to protect him.
